title: r/Prorevenge My Girlfriend Cheated On Me, So I Made Her Fail School!
description: r/Prorevenge OP is dating a girl in high school, and he discovers that she's been secretly cheating on him by finding guys to hook up with online. Luckily for OP, he's also tutoring her in a very important subject at school. Instead of getting mad, OP gets even? He photoshops fake lesson plans to trick his girlfriend into learning wrong information so that she's guaranteed to fail the class and delay her graduation!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
